partial_orders.reason: Both edits perform an identical textual substitution on the same type of syntactic construct (docstring parameter descriptions). They change 'int or RandomState instance' to 'int, RandomState instance or None' in parameter documentation. This is a bulk uniform substitution pattern where the same before→after transformation is applied to the same construct type (docstring parameter descriptions) across different files. This appears to be part of a single, contiguous refactor to standardize parameter documentation format.
